E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Shawn Deckert
Dear Sir,
Shawn Deckert is doing pretty good at A Shalomar Scythes!
He has an ERA of 1.12, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Scouting Director
